attributes.action: Prevent the charging of charities when they are advertising for their campaign
attributes.background: Some charities in the UK spend less than half of their income on good causes, and instead spend it on advertising to promote their campaign, meaning much of the money donated is not used towards making a difference via their campaign.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
